descriptionHtml:
[color=FBB601][size=6]Description[/size][/color]

It changes All guards in towns with chainmail and Hi-Res leather.


[color=FBB601][size=6]Changelog[/size][/color]
V0.3
-Winterhold has been added included helmet.

V0.2b
-File\'s has BEEN added, 
-Solitude armor added (helmet not yet finished)

V0.1a:
-Cloth has been changed
-Helmet has been changed

V0.1:
- Replace all guards in Witherun (90% done)

To Do list:
- [color=green]All other Ci[/color]ty\'s/hold\'s left in skyrim
- [color=green]GuardsH[/color]elmets.


[color=FBB601][size=6]Check out my other mods:[/size][/color]

-Ysollde The Follower
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10427

-Darker/and blooded chainmail iron armor!
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3351

-Blooded iron amor V2
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3326

-Guy Fawkess mask/V for Vendetta mask (WIP)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1607


[color=FBB601][size=6]Help Section[/size][/color]
To get the texture work with the texture DLC read below

[color=028482] Find and open up Skyrim.ini (Win7: .\\Users\\<UserName>\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim)
-Find the setting \"sResourceArchiveList\" under the [Archive] section (or add it, if the line doesn\'t exist)

Change this line to read:
-sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa

-Save this, then open up the Skyrim Launcher and disable the two texture packs.

-Now you should all the goodness of the DLC Texture packs (hi-rez items, etc) but Mods will be able to overwrite this.  [/color]
-Thanks to [color=red]daedryn[/color] For getting this fix[color=red]
[size=4]note[/size][/color] i\'ll uploaded the file already for ULTRA settings ( just put it in(Win7: .\\Users\\<UserName>\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim) (BACK-UP the old one just incase)
[color=purple]Please Endorse![/color] Author: RICOOABC/Pivotstick
author: Pivotstick
